title: Can I import eBooks from a phone to Kindle? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes. There are two ways that I know. 1. You must be having a kindle account. Just mail your ebook (pdf format) to that id (it should be like: xyz.kindle.com). The mail should have the subject: "convert" and attach you ebook to it.  Soon you will receive a mail with a file in kindle format (on your registered id) and thereafter you can just download the book using a wifi connection on your kindle. 2. Use a pc. Download the book directly from the mail you received and transfer it to the Document folder of your kindle. Happy reading!
Yes you can..by sending an email to the kindle account with the book as an attachment or by copying the books in the kindle via a computer.
Yes you can do so. Amazon offers a personal document service using which you can mail books from your phone to your kindle device.
